scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of letters to and from Everett P. Hurt. Many letters are to and from Theodore J. Hoover, professor of Mining.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Everett P. Hurt was a Mining/Engineering student in the class of 1923. He earned a BS from Arizona in 1921.
